title: Molecular and material property variations during the ideal degradation and mechanical recycling of PET
content:

Chiara Fiorillo, Lynn Trossaert, Erion Bezeraj, Simon Debrie, Hannelore Ohnmacht, Paul H. M. Van Steenberge, Dagmar R. D'hooge, Mariya Edeleva
To verify if PET mechanical recycling is feasible, we need to acknowledge chemical and material property variations. This review highlights the relevance of the connectivity of these variations as a function of the number of recycling cycles.
